use_case.title: Add another Portal as a Related Portal
use_case.description: A Portal Administrator (PA) wishes to add a reference to his or her Portal to a Related Portal.

trigger.value: A Portal Administrator wishes to add a reference to another portal as a Related APortal

use_case.preconditions: It is a necessary pre-condition for this Use Case, that at least one other Portal has granted "Related Portal" access.
use_case.basic_path:
1. The PA clicks on the Configure Portal link
  2. The PA then the Related Portals Tab
  3. The PA is presented with a list of Portals on the system that have granted access as a related portal to the PA's portal group. Note: Those Portals that are already listed as related Portals are listed, but grayed out.
  4. The PA selects a Portal from the list
  5. The PA then clicks the Add Related Portal button on this configuration page
  6. The PA is returned to the Portal Tab Configuration page.
use_case.success_end_conditions: The new related Portal appears within the Related Portals portlet.
